definition: public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
to take charge of/to manage/department (under a ministry)

sentences.english: Time Warner is parent company of AOL.
sentences.chinese: 时代华纳是美国在线的母公司。

sentences.english: Opportunities can sometimes arise not in the spinoff but in the parent-company shares.
sentences.chinese: 有时，机会可能不在分拆而是在母公司的股票。

sentences.english: As far as the parent company, NRG Energy, the change was more needed perhaps.
sentences.chinese: 至于母公司，NRG能源，改变也许更需要。

sentences.english: The company has decided to amalgamate with the parent firm.
sentences.chinese: 这家子公司已决定和母公司合并。

sentences.english: The parent companies split the sales and profits from the venture.
sentences.chinese: 两家母公司平分合资公司的销售收入和利润。

sentences.english: Its parent company is Inter IKEA Holding, registered in Luxembourg.
sentences.chinese: 它的母公司是国际宜家控股集团，注册在卢森堡。

sentences.english: AVK GUMMI A/S is the biggest rubber sealing compounds manufactory with the first advanced rubber mill in the world.
sentences.chinese: 母公司拥有世界上最先进的橡胶自动混炼工厂。

sentences.english: He later impersonates the president of the parent company and arrives at his old plant on an inspection tour.
sentences.chinese: 后来他冒充母公司的总裁到他原来工作的厂里视察。

sentences.english: You yourself proposed yesterday that the parent companies should not charge the joint venture for such pre - start - up expenses.
sentences.chinese: 贵方昨天提议母公司不应该收取合资公司的预开车费。

sentences.english: Calls and emails to Baldwin and parent company Gibson went unreturned.
sentences.chinese: 电话和电子邮件，以鲍德温和母公司的吉布森去回应。

sentences.english: The firm will be incorporated with the parent company.
sentences.chinese: 该公司将与母公司合并。

sentences.english: Be determined by suffixing the single character to its parent's key.
sentences.chinese: 取决于单个字符后缀其母公司的关键。

sentences.english: Firms later created smaller" Mini Me" versions of the parent company across the world.
sentences.chinese: 随后公司在全世界创造母公司的自我迷你版。

sentences.english: The parent company of the Sofitel didn't immediately respond to a request for comment.
sentences.chinese: 索菲亚酒店的母公司暂时没有回复记者的置评请求。

sentences.english: DemandStudios (DS) is the parent company for many websites, including eHow.
sentences.chinese: DS是很多网站的母公司，包括eHow。

sentences.english: Franchisers can sell things using the parent company's name.
sentences.chinese: 获得授权的可以母公司的名义销售产品。

definition: to own a controlling number of shares in a company
to inject funds/to put money into (the market)
to purchase (from various places)/to acquire (a company)
merger and acquisition (M and A)/acquisition/to take over
